oneOnOne.title: 1-to-1 Chat
oneOnOne.description: A new chatroom will be created with each unique click on the PinChat link, and the unique user can start a 1-to-1 chat with the link owner. This is best used in scenarios such as business inquiries and customer services.

groupChat.title: Group Chat
groupChat.description: With each unique click on the PinChat link, all users will enter the same chatroom, and start a group chat with the link owner. Also, those who entered the chatroom later will be able to see messages sent earlier.
groupChat.imageAlt: Group chat interface with multiple conversations

richMessages.title: Send All Kinds of Messages
richMessages.description: With PinChat, you can send text messages, voice messages, pictures, videos, files, location, etc., all kinds of messages.
richMessages.imageAlt: Chat interface with rich media sharing capabilities

messageActions.title: Multiple Message Actions
messageActions.description: Perform different actions to a message after it has been sent.

stickers.title: Express Yourself with Stickers
stickers.description: We provide up to 40 free original stickers to make your chat more lively.
stickers.imageAlt: Collection of 40 free original stickers for chat

chatWidget.description: Embed chat directly into your website

hero.title: Empowering Every Conversation
hero.subtitle: PinChat was founded with a vision to make business communication simple, meaningful, and accessible for everyone. We believe every conversation has the power to build trust and drive growth.

mission.quote: We are committed to building the world's most intuitive and efficient communication platform, enabling every conversation to flow seamlessly and create value.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: From inception to becoming a trusted communication platform

origins.title: PinChat Origins
origins.description: PinChat was born from a simple observation: conversations between businesses and customers were often fragmented and difficult to manage. Our initial idea started as lightweight chatrooms shared via short links or QR codes—making it effortless for merchants and consumers to connect without technical barriers.

2019.title: 2019 – Version 1
2019.description: Completed the first backend version, laying the foundation for PinChat.

2020.title: 2020 – First Customers
2020.description: Continued iterations and improvements, welcoming our very first customers.

2022.title: 2022 – Expansion & Recognition
2022.description: Launched third-party integrations and payment features. Officially listed on AppSumo, gaining international exposure.

2025.title: 2025 – AI PinBot
2025.description: Released AI PinBot, introducing advanced conversational intelligence to empower businesses with smarter customer support.

values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

simplicity.description: We believe powerful tools should be easy to use. No complexity, just results.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about PinChat pricing and features.
faq.q1: Do you offer a free plan or trial?
faq.a1:
Yes. PinChat offers a Free plan with essential chat features, and all paid plans come with a 7-day free trial. The trial includes our core features such as AI PinBot, chat customization, and survey tools.

Some advanced features like third-party integrations (LINE, WhatsApp, Messenger, Instagram) and custom domains are not included in the trial. You can unlock them once you subscribe to a paid plan.
faq.a2: MAU refers to the number of unique users who interact with your chat service within a calendar month. This includes visitors who send messages, participate in conversations, or engage with your AI PinBot. Each unique user is counted once per month, regardless of how many times they chat.
faq.a3: Plans are billed monthly based on your subscription tier. Each plan includes a fixed number of Monthly Active Users (MAU) and AI PinBot messages. If you need more than what's included, you can upgrade your plan or contact us for custom pricing.
faq.a4: Yes. All subscriptions renew automatically every month unless you cancel before your renewal date.
faq.q5: Can I change my plan later?
faq.a5: Yes. You can switch plans at any time. To upgrade or downgrade, simply cancel your current subscription and subscribe to a new plan. The process only takes a few clicks, and your data will remain intact.
faq.q6: What happens if I exceed my usage limits?
faq.a6: If you exceed your MAU or AI PinBot quota, your service will continue but some features (like AI PinBot replies) may pause until you upgrade your plan or contact us to arrange additional capacity.
faq.q7: What happens to my data if I cancel my subscription?
faq.a7: Your data will remain stored for a limited period after cancellation. You can re-subscribe to regain access.
faq.q8: Do you offer custom enterprise pricing?
faq.a8: Yes. For larger teams or businesses with advanced needs, we provide custom plans with flexible features and dedicated support. Please contact us to learn more.
faq.q9: Can I use my own AI provider key (BYOK)?
faq.a9: Yes. Our Standard plan and above supports BYOK (Bring Your Own Key). Currently, Gemini and OpenAI are supported, and more providers will be added soon.

cta.title: Start for free today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses already using PinChat to revolutionize their customer communication. No credit card required.

notes.byok: *BYOK = Bring Your Own Key. Currently supports OpenAI, with more AI providers coming soon.
